Description: Enter a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">berserk</font> mode that increases all attack damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown for this ability will not start until the mode ends.)\n\nTaunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your hatchet, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Berserk_Taunt.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

While Berserk is active, your movement speed is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk_SpeedUp.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font>.

While Berserk is active, gain a portion of your health back every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk_Escalading_Health.TickRate]}s</font>, up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">30%</font> of your maximum health.

Remove all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stuns</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slows</font>, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">roots</font> from yourself when you activate Berserk.

While Berserk is active, your attacks are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">uninterruptible</font> and you can't be <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggered</font>.

Leap forward and strike <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">twice</font>.

First Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack1.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font>.
Second Hit: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SprintAttack2.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

If target is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health, Feral Rush deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_FeralRush_DMGVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage.

If Feral Rush hits a target in the back, it inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font>, immobilizing the target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Rush_Root.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Perform <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> fast attacks, each dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Raging_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Press light attack at the end of Raging Torrent to perform a final attack that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RapidStrikes_FinalBlow.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Basic attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_LightHeavyVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> successful light attacks or aimed throws against the same target, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}%</font> damage increase for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DurationMax]}s</font> or until the next attack.

After a successful heavy attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}%</font> damage increase for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> attacks within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DurationMax]}s</font>.

All cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy with an attack while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%</font>.

Increase base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for every enemy within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]}m</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.MaxNumAroundMe]} targets.)</font>

Hitting the same target with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_FortifyAfter3Attacks.NumConsecutiveHits]}</font> consecutive light attacks grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Remove all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font>, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">poison</font> effects from yourself if you hit an enemy while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

When you receive lethal damage, avoid death. You are reduced to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]}</font> health and gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">immortality</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

Throw a hatchet up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25m</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and applying <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font>, reducing target's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage absorption</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.ABSStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Rend</font> duration increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font> if the target is further than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.

If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, it deals an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DmgOnDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> damage.

If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, its cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_CDROnDebuff.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Throw a hatchet up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25m</font> forward, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SocialDistancing.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and inflicting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>\n\nIf standing still or moving backwards, you will dodge backwards obtaining momentary <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">invulnerability</font>. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue moving unhindered.

If Social Distancing hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing your movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Social Distancing applies a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Root.BaseDuration]}s root</font> to targets farther than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Distance_BetterSlow.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.

Leap into the air and throw a hatchet that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
This attack inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Disease.HealMod * -100]}% disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% weaken</font> to your target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Disease.BaseDuration]}s</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Disease reduces target's incoming healing efficiency.)
(Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)</font>

Increased the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Disease.BaseDuration]}s</font> when hitting targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_Infected_BuffWeakenVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% </font>health.

Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_Spell_InfectedThrowAOE.Radius]}m </font>radius <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> cloud on impact that lingers in place for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font>.

Replaces block with an <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">aimed throw</font> that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. Hold block to enter aimed stance and press light attack to throw.

Increased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">melee</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CriticalThrows.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.\n\nIncreased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">ranged</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CriticalThrows_Ranged.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.

All attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_DmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage to targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>.
Every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">third</font> thrown hatchet hit is a guaranteed critical hit.

Thrown hatchets that hit targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> reduce all hatchet ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CDROnDebuffThrow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

Critical hits with light attacks and aimed throws regenerate <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_StaminaGainCrit.Stamina]}</font> stamina.

Thrown hatchets deal additional damage based on distance from the target. Up to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_StaminaOnDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage at <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_StaminaOnDebuff.LinearlyScaleToDistance]}m</font> or greater.

Dodging within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_DodgeStaminaCost.BaseDuration]}s</font> of hitting a target with an ability consumes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25%</font> less stamina.

Hitting a target with a thrown hatchet extends the duration of all hatchet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> you applied on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult *100]}%</font>.\n\nAll attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration_Damage.BaseDamage *100]}%</font> additional damage per <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> on the target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration_Damage.PerStatusEffectOnTargetMax]} debuffs max)</font>
